metadata.synopsis: Orin, Chosen of Bhaal resides in Bhaal Temple, waiting for the players to arrive. She has given them an ultimatum to kill Gortash and retrieve his Netherstone for her, or the player's abducted companion will be sacrified.  If the players didn't have a valid companion for kidnapping, Yenna will take the place of sacrifice.Depending on the approach the player took to the altar, they may be in a slightly different position relative to the altar. Orin will teleport into the same spot on the alter in order to begin the dialogue.Regardless of the player's actions within the temple, and regardless of Gortash's fate, Orin will eventually begin a fight with the players. Determined to prove to Bhaal and herself that she is a worthy Chosen of Bhaal.She will transform into the slayer in the final moments of the dialogue, and then combat begins.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) With the debugbook, go to Act 3 -> Undercity -> Bhaal Temple -> Bhaal Temple Bridge.2) oe BTSetKilledGortash for Gortash killed3) oe BTUnholyAssassin for Unholy Assassin title.4) oe BTSetKilledSarevok for Sarevok killed.5) oe BTSetWarnedOrin for Orin was warned. If you set this, as you approach Orin, she will kill the victim first before you can talk to her. (Another dialog file)6) Go into the Bhaal Temple and trigger conversation with Orin.

33.speaker: Orin
33.text: Hush hush. I hear footsteps trip-trapping on the Murder Lord's stones.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches as Orin transports herself close to the altar. She whispers to Yenna on the altar, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: As though she's quieting the victim on the altar. Addressing the abductee, but really speaking for the player's benefit

54.speaker: Orin
54.text: Hush hush. I hear footsteps trip-trapping on the Murder Lord's stones.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches as Orin transports herself close to the altar. She whispers to the altar victim, who appears to be lying in a restful sleep, unharmed.NodeContext: As though she's quieting the victim on the altar. Addressing the abductee, but really speaking for the player's benefit

124.speaker: Orin
124.text: It lied to me. It lets the tyrant live and comes crawling into Bhaal's sanctum instead.
124.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pretends to be saying this to the altar character, but keeps her eyes on the player - it's definitely aimed at them.NodeContext: Leaning close to the abductee, but speaking to the player. Pissed off that the player refused her.

106.speaker: Orin
106.text: I know what you did. Spilled my grandfather's crimson... He was mine. He showed me how to slice and slit. He guides my daggers still.
106.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

36.speaker: Orin
36.text: Did it think it could protect? Did it think it could save? Only the blades can offer salvation.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Hushed, as though to companion on altar, but really for player's benefit. Mocking player's intentions. On  the cusp of killing the victim. 'It' is player.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

142.speaker: Player
142.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.
142.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

192.speaker: Player
192.text: Like your mother's punishment? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders.
192.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

173.speaker: Player
173.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...
173.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Like the salvation your mother offered? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin releases the altar victim and leaps down (reuse of existing moment)

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Like your mother's punishment? She attacked you on Sarevok's orders. Your father's orders...
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

110.speaker: Player
110.text: Gortash is dead. I left him rotting on the roof of his fortress.
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

68.speaker: Orin
68.text: You do not smell of his corpse-rot. But yes - I feel it. He is grave meat now.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

125.speaker: Orin
125.text: You do not smell of his corpse-rot. But yes - I feel it. He is grave meat now.
125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin closes her eyes, inhales - trying to sense if you speak the truthNodeContext: unbelieving, but then thinking she has some otherworldly sense of his death - delighted

60.text: Liar. LIAR! He still sucks air in his rock-rotten fortress.
60.context: NodeContext:  A flash of Orin's most violent, petulant side. She's really pissed off at the player.

153.speaker: Orin
153.text: Liar. LIAR! He still sucks air in his rock-rotten fortress.
153.context: NodeContext:  A flash of Orin's most violent, petulant side. She's really pissed off at the player.

112.speaker: Orin
112.text: You disobeyed the Murder Lord. He will be compensated.
112.context: NodeContext: Pissed off at you, excited to make the kill of the companion on the altar

163.speaker: Narrator
163.text: Not good enough. No gristle, no meat, poor clay for sculpting an atrocity.
163.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into the victim's skull, one through each eye. The victim opens their mouth, splutters and dies.  Orin drags her blades free, giggling.NodeContext: Emote. The altar victim is on the verge of death, horrifically brutalised and with their tongue cut out. We need a short emote for when Orin flips their head over, to tell us that they're still alive.

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: Not good enough. No gristle, no meat, poor clay for sculpting an atrocity.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin raises her duel daggers  high and SLAMS them into Yenna's skull, one through each eye - we look away, seeing the player's horrified reaction. Orin drags her blades free, giggling.NodeContext: Emote. The altar victim is on the verge of death, horrifically brutalised and with their tongue cut out. We need a short emote for when Orin flips their head over, to tell us that they're still alive.

102.speaker: Orin
102.text: Not good enough. No gristle, no meat, poor clay for sculpting an atrocity.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the player. She licks the blood from her right-hand dagger, then sheathes both (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Tasting the blood on her blade. Sneering, unsatisfied

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Disgusting creature. You'll pay for what you did here.
84.context: NodeContext: Turning on the  player - building the sense of threat

187.speaker: Orin
187.text: Now it is your turn on the slab. Your turn to watch the veins split and bones break.
187.context: NodeContext: Turning on the  player - building the sense of threat

169.speaker: Player
169.text: Call yourself a murderer. A flumph could do worse.
169.context: NodeContext: "That was nothing", referring to her murdering the victim on the altar

183.speaker: Orin
183.text: I was only wetting the blades.
183.context: NodeContext: "That was nothing", referring to her murdering the victim on the altar

51.speaker: Orin
51.text: I have skinned and cleaved and corrupted, set hooks to living flesh and torn, spilled the gore from thousands.
51.context: NodeContext: Bigging herself up, "You have no idea what I'm capable of"

145.speaker: Player
145.text: Offer a prayer for your departed companion's soul.

154.speaker: Orin
154.text: Only Bhaal listens now. Your prayers are bitter salt and ash - they are nothing.

37.speaker: Orin
37.text: What's the matter? Is its mouth meat all tangled? Too trembly to wag its word flap at me?

30.speaker: Orin
30.text: Your murder should have been exquisite. A crypt-born effigy to greet Bhaal's bleeding dawn. And now it will be nothing.
30.context: NodeContext: Anger coming back out - the player ruined her plans. Venomous.

104.speaker: Player
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

77.speaker: Player
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player draws their weapon/adopts a fighting stance.

196.speaker: Player
196.text: Anything you do to him, I will inflict on you a hundredfold.
196.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player, sheathing her daggers. (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: Anything you do to her, I will inflict on you a hundredfold.
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player, sheathing her daggers. (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

138.speaker: Orin
138.text: Yes yes give me agony. Pluck me bone from socket. Stroke me with a jagged edge until my skin shreds wet and red.
138.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player, sheathing her daggers. (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

92.speaker: Orin
92.text: Yes yes give me agony. Pluck me bone from socket. Stroke me with a jagged edge until my skin shreds wet and red.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin steps away from the altar, prowls towards the player, sheathing her daggers. (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Amused/loves the idea the player is going to hurt her. Her blood and pain will only make her more worthy of Bhaal.

190.speaker: Orin
190.text: A sharp lamb to be sacrificed, but your cruelty makes the crimson sweeter.

0.text: Just like Gortash - all air, no mettle. Flap your jaw all you like - your vapours hold no threat for me.

16.speaker: Orin
16.text: Just like Gortash - all air, no mettle. Flap your jaw all you like - your vapours hold no threat for me.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: You said Bhaal wanted us to fight. He will reject this offering.
108.context: NodeContext: Approving/accepting - focused on the thought of killing the player instead.

24.speaker: Orin
24.text: You do not lie, underling. It is your blood I am destined to spill. Your death spit will stain these walls, little lamb.
24.context: NodeContext: Approving/accepting - focused on the thought of killing the player instead.

14.speaker: Orin
14.text: You do not lie, underling. It is your blood I am destined to spill. Your death spit will stain these walls, little lamb.
14.context: NodeContext: Approving/accepting - focused on the thought of killing the player instead.

19.text: You think you know Bhaal's will. Then why did you not follow it?

178.speaker: Orin
178.text: You think you know Bhaal's will. Then why did you not follow it?

28.speaker: Player
28.text: I did what you asked. I killed Gortash, so let her go.
28.context: NodeContext: With a smile -about to commit horrible murder

207.context: NodeContext: With a smile -about to commit horrible murder

171.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the player. She licks the blood from her right-hand dagger, then sheathes both (sheathing can be off-camera if needs be.)NodeContext: Tasting the blood on her blade. Sneering, unsatisfied

193.speaker: Orin

191.speaker: Orin
191.text: It refused the Murder Lord's command, and comes crawling into his sanctum with the tyrant unpulped.
191.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pretends to be saying this to the altar character, but keeps her eyes on the player - it's definitely aimed at them.NodeContext: Leaning close to the abductee, but speaking to the player. Pissed off that the player refused her.

64.speaker: Orin
64.text: Loosen the bonds, sweet meat. Bhaal does not crave the taste of bait on his altar.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear. Off-screen, the player repositions to a default position a little way from the altar (out of physical reach)NodeContext: Mocking the player  for saving their companion - it was never about them

91.speaker: Orin
91.text: Look at it, sneaking and snivelling in the shadows.
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear. Off-screen, the player repositions to a default position a little way from the altar (out of physical reach)NodeContext: Sneering, the player failed to free the victim from the altar

119.speaker: Orin
119.text: But wait. You are not the one I asked for. My blood kin has refused our Father's sport. A mind-mangled coward after all.
119.context: NodeContext: Not seeing the Dark Urge, realising she's been denied. Judging them.

1.speaker: Orin
1.text: How much the worm has feasted since I slipped it into its skull. All that plotting, the years of dominating this temple - forgotten.
1.context: NodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

174.speaker: Orin
174.text: Now it sends you to spill my crimson into the soil. Silly, stupid slaughter kin. I will not be denied.
174.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear.NodeContext: Pissed off at you, excited to make the kill of the companion on the altar

66.speaker: Orin
66.text: No trust in my promises, but I smell the tyrant's corpse-reek. You are steeped in his rot.
66.context: NodeContext: slightly scolding - "I can't believe you didn't trust me, but you killed him anyway, so all his forgiven"

100.speaker: Orin
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: SFX for LOW_BhaalTemple_PostBattle. Aligns with node N4 (UUID c378a901-496c-b66b-ddc3-763de09ea941) - Orin-as-slayer collapsing in a pool of blood.NodeContext: Orin giggles as she finally collapses into a pool of blood. A strange, haunting sound - as though she enjoyed being slaughtered.

155.speaker: Orin
155.text: Loosen the bonds, sweet meat. Bhaal does not crave the taste of bait on his altar.
155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin 'transports' herself to the altar, standing over the victim. The player backs away from the altar.NodeContext: Mocking the player  for saving their companion - it was never about them

78.speaker: Orin
78.text: But wait. You are not the one I asked for. My blood kin has refused our Father's sport. A mind-mangled coward after all.
78.context: NodeContext: Not seeing the Dark Urge, realising she's been denied. Judging them.

131.speaker: Orin
131.text: How much the worm has feasted since I slipped it into its skull. All that plotting, the years of dominating this temple - forgotten.
131.context: NodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

58.speaker: Orin
58.text: Now it sends you to spill my crimson into the soil. Silly, stupid slaughter kin. It will never be Bhaal's Chosen now.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leaps from the altar, prowls towards the playerNodeContext: smirking - this was too easy. Key info for players - confirms elements of the Dark Urge's past.

42.speaker: Orin
42.text: He wanted your flesh, dripping with the tyrant's pain, coated in the Bone Lord's ash, but you have failed him.
42.context: NodeContext: Judging the player - they should have killed Gortash and Ketheric first. Now they are nothing.

204.speaker: Orin
204.text: I smell it. Gortash's corpse-stain. His killer approaches.
204.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin transports herself to the altar, keeping the victim between herself and the player. She coos in the victim's unlistening ear.NodeContext: Speaking close into victim's ear, but referring to the player (the 'killer' approaching)

56.text: See how good I was? How patient while you drained the tyrant's juices for me?
56.context: NodeContext: Still close to victim, addressing player. Referring to fact she refrained from killing the abductee

7.speaker: Orin
7.text: See how good I was? How patient while you drained the tyrant's juices for me?
7.context: NodeContext: Still close to victim, addressing player. Referring to fact she refrained from killing the abductee

148.speaker: Orin
148.text: But Sarevok's crimson was not yours to spill. He was mine. You had no right to take him.
148.context: NodeContext: A vicious but contained grief - she's genuinely disturbed by his death, but this isn't a feeling she's had before, so she's suppressing it.

87.speaker: Orin
87.text: I left the blood inside, the pelt unskinned. But I had such plans for this one, and the blade was made to slice...
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin grabs the companion's head again, She draws her daggers, placing the tip of one blade at their exposed throat. A drop of blood trickles down.NodeContext: Longing, playful - on the cusp of unleashhing her violence. All refering to the victim on the slab, but speaking to the player

59.speaker: Orin
59.text: I left the blood inside, the pelt unskinned. But I had such plans for this one, and the blade was made to slice...
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin grabs the companion's head again, She draws her daggers, placing the tip of one blade at their exposed throat. A drop of blood trickles down.NodeContext: Longing, playful - on the cusp of unleashhing her violence. All refering to the victim on the slab, but speaking to the player

140.speaker: Player
140.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Gale go.
140.context: NodeContext: Reluctantly giving up the chance to kill the abductee on the altar

2.speaker: Player
2.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Halsin go.
2.context: NodeContext: Reluctantly giving up the chance to kill the abductee on the altar

141.speaker: Orin
141.text: Yes yes we did. We made a pact, sealed in Father's sight.
141.context: NodeContext: Reluctantly giving up the chance to kill the abductee on the altar

22.speaker: Orin
22.text: You are the one Bhaal craves. Yours is the crimson that should clot my altar.
22.context: NodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smiling. Setting them in her sights.

38.text: All the lordling's pretty plans, bleeding out in the gutters. And soon your crimson will join his.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

161.speaker: Orin
161.text: All the lordling's pretty plans, bleeding out in the gutters. And soon your crimson will join his.
161.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

23.speaker: Orin
23.text: I will finish what my grandfather started. Sarevok brought this city to its knees, but I will be the one to slit its throat. I am Bhaal's Chosen.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

208.speaker: Player
208.text: You shouldn't listen to Sarevok. He ordered your mother to kill you, and lied to you about your heritage. You're his granddaughter and his daughter.
208.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Sarevok ordered your mother to kill you. Why follow his path?
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: You shouldn't listen to Sarevok. He lied to you all along. You're not just his granddaughter, you're also his daughter.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

88.speaker: Orin
88.text: No no NO NO NO! He didn't. He didn't... Filthy, pig-mouthed little LIAR!
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pauses, for a moment dumbstruck. Her focus is now fully on the player. This has hit a nerveNodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

17.speaker: Orin
17.text: Grandfather loved me. He worshipped me. These petty smearings will not save you.
17.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

176.speaker: Orin
176.text: Grandfather loves me. He worships me. How dare you smear his name? It will not save you.
176.context: NodeContext: Processing this information - this is driving her over the edge. She can't believe this. She won't.

180.speaker: Player
180.text: You're pathetic. No wonder he tricked you so easily.
180.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Sarevok told me the truth himself. He was laughing at you.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

86.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

15.speaker: Orin
15.text: No. Not him. Not him... I did all this for him. Everything... everything...
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin freezes for a moment. This can't be true. NodeContext: Genuine doubt creeping in. This is breaking every truth she believes about herself and her purpose.

85.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
85.text: No, Orin. You did this for me.
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: An unseen voice speak out. Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.

103.speaker: Orin
103.text: Bhaal... Father, they lie to me. They lie!
103.context: NodeContext: reacting to hearing Bhaal's voice in the temple. Almost childlke, she can't handle this

186.speaker: Bhaal Avatar
186.text: Hush, child. No more doubts, no more fears, no more Orin. Become murder.
186.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin begins to jerk, her face contorted. She (involuntarily) transforms into the slayer.NodeContext: Unseen. Commanding. Condemning.Turning Orin into the slayer.

116.speaker: Orin
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin roars, filling the temple with the sound of her screams. The player gets ready to fight.NodeContext: Will require SFX once shea's fully transformed. Option to record a battle cry/scream that transforms into the SFX roar.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: Sarevok's your father, Orin. He abused your mother. He abused you.
129.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

170.speaker: Player
170.text: Bhaal rejoices in such cruel betrayals. You really believed you were the exception?
170.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

13.speaker: Orin
13.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

157.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

128.speaker: Orin
128.context: NodeContext: Vicious, rejecting everything the player is saying

121.speaker: Orin
121.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pulses with Bhaal's energy. She transforms into her slayer form, grotesque and terrifying. The player draws their weapon, recoiling.NodeContext: Furious, brimming with hatred. She'll transform into the slayer at the end of this line

21.speaker: Orin
21.text: Your skin will be grandfather's shroud, coward. I will flay you where you stand.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I'm not the one who needs saving.
97.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

98.speaker: Orin
98.text: You hold no threat for me. Nor do your petty little vapours.
98.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, riled up. Getting ready to attack the player

137.speaker: Player
137.text: You will fail as Sarevok did. As all Bhaalspawn are destined to fail.
137.context: NodeContext: What Orin truly wants, so nearly within her grasp

133.speaker: Orin
133.text: He did not fail. He carved the bedrock on which I will erect Bhaal's cathedral.
133.context: NodeContext: What Orin truly wants, so nearly within her grasp

41.speaker: Orin
41.text: When I set my blades to your neck, the Murder Lord will taste my domination. His true Chosen, born of butchery. One fit to control the Crown.
41.context: NodeContext: What Orin truly wants, so nearly within her grasp

203.speaker: Player
203.text: So you're just continuing the family business? How original.

194.speaker: Orin
194.text: He watches over me. He worships me. He built the foundations on which I'll carve Bhaal's succession.

209.speaker: Player
209.text: And what part do the stones play in this 'plan' of yours?

143.speaker: Orin
143.text: When the brain bows to me, so will the Absolute's mob. Baldur's Gate will be Bhaal's cathedral, and my slaughter-horde will worship here.

179.speaker: Orin
179.text: When this city heaves its final breath, we will march on to the next. And the next. And the next.
179.context: NodeContext: Like it's a secret, truly horrifying - she will never stop

69.speaker: Orin
69.text: Come to me, Father. Set my flesh to your unholy purpose.
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin pulses with Bhaal's energy. She transforms into her slayer form, grotesque and terrifying. The player draws their weapon, recoiling.NodeContext: Invoking her god's powers, calling out to him

167.speaker: Orin
167.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin roars, filling the temple with the sound of her screams. The player gets ready to fight.NodeContext: Will require SFX once shea's fully transformed. Option to record a battle cry/scream that transforms into the SFX roar.

123.speaker: Orin
123.text: The Murder Lord's blessing will be mine, once I peel the skin from your carcass.
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin draws her blades, ready for combat. She smiles.NodeContext: Threatening/eyes shining. Energized. Combat about to begin.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Baldur's Gate deserves such a fate. Your vision is exquisite.
44.context: NodeContext: Recognising the player's bloodlust - Orin likes it. Building anticipation, eager to please her god

132.speaker: Orin
132.text: And your crimson will be the first to bless its stones.

181.speaker: Player
181.context: NodeContext: Recognising the player's bloodlust - Orin likes it. Building anticipation, eager to please her god

3.speaker: Orin
3.text: Yes yes. Bhaal shudders beneath us. He calls our crimson forth. He will be sated.
3.context: NodeContext: Recognising the player's bloodlust - Orin likes it. Building anticipation, eager to please her god

31.speaker: Player
31.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Lae'zel go.
31.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

83.speaker: Player
83.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Minthara go.
83.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

45.speaker: Player
45.text: We had a deal. I killed Gortash, so let Yenna go.
45.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Harm him and I swear I'll do tenfold worse to you.
8.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

81.speaker: Orin
81.text: Is your skull thick with thoughts about your blade in my belly? Cutting and cutting and cutting.
81.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they fantasize about killing her

206.speaker: Orin
206.text: Shred me. Tear me. It is Bhaal's blood you spill from my flesh. And you might, now the tyrant rots.
206.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smilingNodeContext: Likes the idea of her own pain as much as causing someone else's. Setting her sights on the player now. 'Tyrant' is Gortash.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Harm her and I swear I'll do tenfold worse to you.
113.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they share a special connection, that killing the player will be special

152.speaker: Player
152.text: Go ahead. I won't stop you.
152.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they share a special connection, that killing the player will be special

35.speaker: Player
35.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they share a special connection, that killing the player will be special

52.speaker: Orin
52.text: You long for me, don't you? You crave the feeling of my blades against your skin.
52.context: NodeContext: Likes the idea they share a special connection, that killing the player will be special

62.speaker: Orin
62.text: You will be next. Your blood will clot the gutters of this place, your flesh will rot on the slab. A worthy offering at last.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin stands up and prowls towards the player, smilingNodeContext: Just killed the victim on the altar.  Her blood's pumping now - she's already longing for the next kill. Has her sights on the player.

65.speaker: Orin
65.text: But you did not listen. Thought my instructions could be ignored. I told you what to do, whelp worm, and you disobeyed.
65.context: NodeContext: the player failed Orin's instructions in one of several non-specific

151.speaker: Orin
151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin leans over the player's companion on their altar, admires their form. She draws her daggers, places the tip of one blade at the abductee's exposed throat.NodeContext: Whispered to the comapnion on the altar, but intended for the player. She's been punished for her own disobedience countless times before, and enjoys doling this out to others.

26.speaker: Orin
26.text: You knew the Murder Lord could not be denied his meat.
26.context: NodeContext: Still close to abductee. Referring to fact player initially refused to kill Gortash. Hint of a threat, given she has her own 'meat' (the abductee) ready for sacrifice
